Pre-Game Insights: Croatia will be aiming to bounce back to winning ways after suffering a narrow loss against Portugal.
Poland secured a thrilling 3-2 victory over Scotland to begin the competition on a positive note.
Luka Modric will be crucial for the home team.
Robert Lewandowski is in his prime form this season after opening the new season with four goals in four matches for Barcelona.
Croatia are unbeaten in their last four home matches.
Poland have won just once in their last four matches.
Croatia are unbeaten in their last three matches against Poland.
Croatia will be without the services of Lovro Majer, Josip Stanisic and Martin Erlic through injuries.
Poland have all the players available in their squad except for Arkadiusz Milik and Jakub Kiwior who are ruled out due to injury.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Kick-Off: Sunday, 8 September 2024 at 7:45 PM UK, Monday, 9 September 2024 at 12:15 AM IST.
Croatia predicted lineup (4-3-3): Livakovic (GK); Caleta-Car, Sutalo, Gvardiol, Sosa; Modric, Susic, Kovacic; Pasalic, Kramaric, Matanovic.
Poland predicted lineup (3-5-2): Bulka (GK); Bednarek, Dawidowicz, Walukiewicz; Frankowski, Szymanski, Zielinski, Urbanski, Zalewski; Piatek, Lewandowski.
Telecast for Croatia vs Poland: India – Sony Sports Network, SonyLIV; UK – ITVX, Premier Sports; US – FOX Sports App, Fox Sports 2; Nigeria – SuperSport, DStv Now.
